reviews.review_msg: Sitara is a VERY intelligent and a passionate instructor, that much was clear. I found I enjoyed listening to her but not learning from her. Both the assigned readings and language that she used were challenging and undigestible. truly, it was frustrating. She had told the class that it was the only way to present the material, but I beg to differ

Brilliant. You will learn so much, and you don't have to be an expert in the field of study to do well. They care about their students success and are so excited to teach their material. As long as you are invested and complete the work, you're going to do at least okay, but probably well.

She is a fantastic prof who is understanding and approachable. She has more assignments but allows you to have more chances to do better. Quizzes are done in class but the occasional sick is okay. She engages in good discussion. Generally enjoyed it.
